alert.note: Alert for Okanogan; Pend Oreille (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued June 11 at 3:38PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...POTENTIAL FOR MODERATE TO HEAVY RAIN SUNDAY NIGHT INTO MONDAY IN EASTERN OKANOGAN COUNTY... Rain will spread into Northeastern Washington Sunday night and expand westward into Eastern Okanogan County. There is moderate to high uncertainty regarding rainfall amounts across eastern Okanogan County. Rainfall amounts vary from as little as a tenth of an inch to as much as one inch. Given recent rainfall and saturated grounds...if rainfall amounts were closer to an inch there is concern for additional mud and rock slides near recent burn scars. Residents across eastern Okanogan county, east of Highway 97 should continue to monitor forecast updates over the next 24 hours.
